name: Rheksetor: Waves of Fury
description:
Blast through waves of enemy ships, conquer every sector, and help The Order to secure a future among the stars.

Set in the far future of Rheksetor, after a catastrophic planetary explosion, evil forces are trying to take all remaining natural resources and destroy any hope of peace and stability. As a faithful zealot of The Order, your mission is to stop them.

Rheksetor: Waves of Fury is a rapidly evolving game with many different planned and potential features to be added in the future.

Current Features:
Explore the remains of Rheksetor, split up into sectors
Defeat waves of enemies in each sector
Build sector upgrades to gather more resources
Upgrade your ship and weapons
Customize your ship with different elements
Upgrade damage for your chosen elements

Planned Features:
Ship equipment loot drops to customize and improve your ship (including set items)
Activated skills to use during combat
Unique ship classes (each with their own set of skills)
Combat mechanics that fit the theme of each element (frost slows, fire burns over time, blood drains, etc)
Semi-randomized "biome" regions within the larger world map
Wider range of sector types, offering different kinds of challenges
NPC's that offer sector-specific quests
More enemies and loot variety

Potential Features:
Multiplayer co-op and competitive modes
AI-controlled allies to assist in combat
Skill trees for ship classes, allowing a wider range of progression choices
Aesthetic theme packs to personalize your space-faring experience
A rich story driven campaign
Planned content improvement (monthly updates - in line with holidays):
